properties.name: checksum
properties.description: Concatenated md5 checksums of all the files that are part of the object.

properties.name: contenttype
properties.description: contenttype specifies the type of object.

properties.name: created
properties.description: created is the date and time at which the object was created in Open Content.

properties.name: deleted
properties.description: Flag indicating whether the object is deleted.

properties.name: group
properties.description: group divides objects into certain object groups. Group is used together with permission configuration for authorization of objects.

properties.name: metadata
properties.description: URLs referring to the metadata files of the object.

properties.name: metadata_mimetype
properties.description: Mimetypes of the metadata files that are part of the object.

properties.name: mimetype
properties.description: Mimetype of the primary file of the object.

properties.name: organisation
properties.description: organisation

properties.name: preview
properties.description: A URL referring to the preview file of the object.

properties.name: primary
properties.description: A URL referring to the primary file of the object.

properties.name: source
properties.description: Client system identifier. It can be any string and describes the source system the object came from.

properties.name: thumbnail
properties.description: A URL referring to the thumbnail file of the object.

properties.name: unit
properties.description: unit

properties.name: updated
properties.description: updated is the date and time at which the object was updated in Open Content.

properties.name: user
properties.description: user

properties.name: uuid
properties.description: uuid identifies the object. It is preferably a UUID, but it can be any string.

properties.name: version
properties.description: Version of the object.

properties.name: ArticleBody
properties.description: Body text of the article.

properties.name: ArticleCaption
properties.description: List of Article Captions

properties.name: ArticleMetaNewsValue
properties.description: DO NOT DELETE OR CHANGE... Article newsValue

properties.name: ArticleUuids
properties.description: DO NOT DELETE OR CHANGE... Uuids from related Articles

properties.name: ConceptRelations
properties.description: DO NOT DELETE OR CHANGE... Article concepts used by article

properties.name: ConceptUuids
properties.description: DO NOT DELETE OR CHANGE... Concepts used by article

properties.name: ObjectCreated
properties.description: Created date from metadata

properties.name: ObjectCreator
properties.description: Creator of the object
